TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RepeaterCommandEventHandler(object source, RepeaterCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed RepeaterCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub RepeaterCommandEventHandler(source As Object, e As RepeaterCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void RepeaterCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ source, RepeaterCommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event of the . 按鈕的相關資訊會顯示當內控制按下。Information about the button is displayed when a control within the is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RepeaterCommandEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterCommandEventHandler Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RepeaterCommandEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RepeaterCommandEventHandler Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
